data.title: Most reasonably priced compared to the rest
data.text: On time, courteous and priced right. Easy to do business with. Clean comfortable vehicle. Ran about $25 cheaper that other limo services giving airport to downtown service.

data.title: Fast, safe and comfortable ride in Chicago
data.text:
I used this company for sightseeing in Chicago. After booking the ride over internet there was a car waiting for me at the airport. The driver was very polite and helped me with planning (he told me at what time it's best to visit the places I wanted to see).
The ride was very comfy and I had an excellent time, visiting a lot of places for the whole day, avoiding traffic thanks to the help of my driver. The car was clean and i recommend it to everyone.
